org.opentrafficsim.car

Class Car

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentrafficsim.car.Car
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, nl.tudelft.simulation.dsol.animation.LocatableInterface, GTU<Integer,LocationRelative<Line<String>>,DoubleScalar.Rel<SpeedUnit>>

    public class Car
extends Object
implements GTU<Integer,LocationRelative<Line<String>>,DoubleScalar.Rel<SpeedUnit>>
    This is a quick hack attempting to test-implement IDM+.

    Copyright (c) 2013-2014 Delft University of Technology, PO Box 5, 2600 AA, Delft, the Netherlands. All rights reserved.
    BSD-style license. See OpenTrafficSim License.

    Version:
    Jul 2, 2014
    Author:
    Peter Knoppers
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • Car

        public Car(int id,
   OTSDEVSSimulatorInterface simulator,
   CarFollowingModel carFollowingModel,
   DoubleScalar.Abs<TimeUnit> initialTime,
   DoubleScalar.Abs<LengthUnit> initialPosition,
   DoubleScalar.Rel<SpeedUnit> initialSpeed)
        Create a new Car.
        Parameters:
        id - integer; the id of the new Car
        simulator - OTSDEVSSimulator
        carFollowingModel - CarFollowingModel; the car following model used by the new Car
        initialTime - DoubleScalar.Abs<TimeUnit>; the first evaluation time of the new Car
        initialPosition - DoubleScalar.Abs<LengthUnit>; the initial position of the new Car
        initialSpeed - DoubleScalar.Rel<SpeedUnit>; the initial speed of the new Car

    • Method Detail

      • getVelocity

        public final DoubleScalar.Rel<SpeedUnit> getVelocity(DoubleScalar.Abs<TimeUnit> when)
        Return the speed of this Car at the specified time.
        v(t) = v0 + (t - t0) * a
        Parameters:
        when - time for which the speed must be returned
        Returns:
        DoubleScalarAbs<SpeedUnit>; the speed at the specified time

      • getPosition

        public final DoubleScalar.Abs<LengthUnit> getPosition(DoubleScalar.Abs<TimeUnit> when)
        Return the position of this Car at the specified time.
        s(t) = s0 + v0 * (t - t0) + 0.5 . a . (t - t0)^2
        Parameters:
        when - time for which the position must be returned.
        Returns:
        DoubleScalarAbs<LengthUnit>; the position at the specified time

      • vMax

        public final DoubleScalar.Rel<SpeedUnit> vMax()
        Return the maximum speed that this Car can drive on a horizontal, straight road.
        Returns:
        DoubleScalarRel<SpeedUnit>; the maximum driving speed

      • headway

        public final DoubleScalar.Rel<LengthUnit> headway(Car otherCar)
                                           throws RemoteException
        Determine by what distance the front of this Car is ahead or behind the front an other Car.
        Positive values indicate that this Car is ahead, negative values indicate behind.
        Parameters:
        otherCar - Car; the car to which the headway must be returned
        Returns:
        DoubleScalarRel<LengthUnit>; the headway
        Throws:
        RemoteException
